Font.selector: .j-menu > li > a, .j-menu > li > a > .links-text, .desktop-language-wrapper button, .desktop-currency-wrapper button, .mobile-language-wrapper button, .mobile-currency-wrapper button, #cart > a

FontHover.selector: .j-menu > li:hover > a, .j-menu > li:hover > a > .links-text, .j-menu > li.active > a > .links-text, .j-menu > li.open > a > .links-text, .j-menu > li.panel-active > a > .links-text, #cart:hover > a, .desktop-language-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .desktop-currency-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .mobile-language-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .mobile-currency-wrapper .dropdown:hover button

FontActive.selector: .j-menu > li.open > a, .j-menu > li.open > a > .links-text, .j-menu > li.active > a > .links-text, .j-menu > li.panel-active > a > .links-text

DIColorHover.selector: .j-menu > li.dropdown:hover > a::after, .j-menu > li.active.dropdown > a::after,  .j-menu > li.open.dropdown > a::after,  .dropdown:hover > button::after

true..j-menu > li > a > .links-text: max-width:var(--menu-max-width, none); white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; padding-bottom: 1px;
true.&.language-currency .currency-title: max-width:var(--menu-max-width, none); white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis
true.&.language-currency .language-title: max-width:var(--menu-max-width, none); white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis

false..j-menu > li > a > .links-text: max-width:none; white-space: normal; overflow: visible; text-overflow: initial; padding-bottom: initial;
false.&.language-currency .currency-title: max-width:none; white-space: normal; overflow: visible; text-overflow: initial
false.&.language-currency .language-title: max-width:none; white-space: normal; overflow: visible; text-overflow: initial

SFontHover.selector: .j-menu > li:hover > a > span > s, .j-menu > li.active > a > span > s, .j-menu > li.panel-active > a > span > s

StaticFont.selector: .j-menu > li > a:not([href]), .j-menu > li > a:not([href]) > .links-text, .j-menu > li > a[href='javascript:;'], .j-menu > li > a[href='javascript:;'] > .links-text

IconHover.selector: .j-menu > li:hover > a::before, .j-menu > li.active > a::before, .j-menu > li.open > a::before, .j-menu > li.panel-active > a::before

Background.selector: .j-menu > li > a, .desktop-language-wrapper button, .desktop-currency-wrapper button, .mobile-language-wrapper button, .mobile-currency-wrapper button

BackgroundHover.selector: .j-menu > li:hover > a, .j-menu > li.active > a, .j-menu > li.open > a, .j-menu > li.panel-active > a, .desktop-language-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .desktop-currency-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .mobile-language-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .mobile-currency-wrapper .dropdown:hover button

Shadow.selector: .j-menu > li > a, .desktop-language-wrapper button, .desktop-currency-wrapper button, .mobile-language-wrapper button, .mobile-currency-wrapper button

ShadowHover.selector: .j-menu > li:hover > a, .desktop-language-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .desktop-currency-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .mobile-language-wrapper .dropdown:hover button, .mobile-currency-wrapper .dropdown:hover button

inline..j-menu > li > a > .count-badge: position: relative; transform:none; margin-inline-start: var(--x, 6px); margin-top: var(--margin-top, 0px); inset-inline-start: initial

floating..j-menu > li > a > .count-badge: position: absolute; margin-inline-start: 0; margin-top: var(--margin-top, 0px); transform: translate3d(calc(75% + var(--x, 0px)), var(--count-badge-y, var(--menu-badge-y)),0); inset-inline-start: initial;

tl..j-menu > li > a > .count-badge: position: absolute; margin-inline-start: 0; margin-top: var(--margin-top, 0px); transform: translate3d(calc(75% + var(--x, 0px)), var(--count-badge-y, var(--menu-badge-y)),0); inset-inline-start: 0

inline..j-menu > li > a > .count-badge: position: relative; margin-inline-start: var(--x, 0px); transform:none; margin-top: var(--margin-top, 0px); inset-inline-start: initial

floating..j-menu > li > a > .count-badge: position: absolute; margin-inline-start: 0; margin-top: var(--margin-top, 0px); transform: translate3d(calc(-75% + var(--x, 0px)),var(--count-badge-y, var(--menu-badge-y)),0); inset-inline-end: initial

tl..j-menu > li > a > .count-badge: position: absolute; margin-inline-start: 0; margin-top: var(--margin-top, 0px); transform: translate3d(calc(75% + var(--x, 0px)), var(--count-badge-y, var(--menu-badge-y)),0); inset-inline-end: 0
